snippet.title: PS2 Longplay [109] Silent Scope (US)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Spazbo4

A very hard PS2 port of the Arcade game, basically nothing is changed in terms of content except this version allows mouse support along with lightgun and PS2 controller. I use a mouse for this longplay just so I can actually beat it as using a lightgun or PS2 controller are just impossible for me.

This game has multiple routes and endings, the routes do not affect the ending but I show all anyway

00:00 - Start
00:16 - Downtown Chicago
01:57 - Air Battle
03:12 - Tower Building
04:07 - Stadium
05:08 - The Hotel Imperial
06:24 - The Highway
08:41 - The Enemy's Base - By Parachuting In
10:45 - The Enemy's Base - Through The Woods
12:53 - Enemy Base
21:47 - Bad Ending - Miss
22:34 - Bad Ending - Body Shot
23:22 - Good Ending - Head Shot
24:07 - Credits

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
